name: Bubble Defender
description:
Created by Group D

Liam Uppenborn

Curtis Hallman

Game Story: Evil Bubbles from another dimension are invading your homeland. Defend your home by building towers that will destroy the enemies. Try and survive through 25 waves and protect your family!

Controls: 

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S- Move Down

D - Move Right

Scroll Wheel- Zoom in/out

Click on Towers to upgrade or sell.

Assets: - Used variations of Brackeys TD scripts, own changes made to them.

                  - Tower images from Brackeys TD Assets Pack
